scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.client:dev: export WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=1 && npm run build && npm start | webpack-dev-server -d --inline --progress --colors
scripts.coveralls: npm run test:cov && npm run test:jest && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.start:watch: nodemon --ignore build/ --exec 'npm test && npm run build && npm start'
scripts.test: if test "$CI_MODE"; then npm run coveralls; else npm run test:nocov; fi
scripts.test:jest-cov: npm run test:mocha && npm run make:jestcovrc && jest --coverage --config=.jestcovrc && rm -rf .jestcovrc
scripts.test:cov: export CI_MODE=1 && babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover _mocha -- --compilers scss:test/style-null-compiler.js --require test/mocha-bootstrap.js test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:nocov: npm run test:mocha && npm run test:jest
scripts.test:watch: nodemon --ignore build/ --exec 'npm test && npm run lint'
scripts.watch:server: npm run build:client && nodemon --ignore build/ --exec 'npm run build:server && npm start'
scripts.watch:test: npm run build:client && nodemon --ignore build/ --exec 'npm test && npm run build:server && npm start'
